snippet: A clearer account of the shooting on Long Island that killed John Capano, a federal agent, is beginning to emerge.
abstract: Events surrounding a 'friendly-fire' shooting in Seaford, NY, in which off-duty federal agent John Capano was killed by retired Nassau County Police Officer Christopher Geraghty while trying to stop an armed robbery, are becoming clear as more facts emerge from witness accounts and analysis.

byline.original: By AL BAKER and JOSEPH GOLDSTEIN

lead_paragraph: A clearer account of the shooting on Long Island that killed John Capano, a federal agent, is beginning to emerge.

headline.seo: Piecing Together Events in Agent’s Fatal Shooting
headline.main: How a Retired Officer, Trying to Stop a Robber, Shot an Agent Doing the Same
headline.print_headline: How Retired Officer, Trying to Stop Robber, Shot Agent Doing the Same

keywords.value: Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco and Firearms
keywords.name: organizations
